item.title: Monday June 25, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: I’m pretty tired. I’m glad that I have only one more day in Canada. This week has been crazy. Fun, but crazy, and it’s wearing me out. Also, the hotel is not the same as being home. I tell you: it really can rain here. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com

item.title: Saturday June 23, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: Well, it was a long day of work. And I need to get a few minutes sleep before we head back to the plant. Yes, we have a few things to do at work at midnight. Tomorrow I’m going to the Baptist church around the corner. So it’ll be nice to drop the work for a little while and do some worship. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com

item.title: Friday June 22, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: I went for a walk today through the neighborhood here. They have little walkways among the houses and and ravines in the area. So I took pictures. Here’s a nifty tree house that I found. Tonight was 10-year-old girls softball night. I saw 5 different games (10 teams) at two different schools in 1 hour. It was the handy paths that allowed me to cover ground and see so much. And they even have bridges over the ravines to make the walk more fun (ie. easy). Then I finished the walk with a stop into the Wired Monk coffee bistro for a little drink. Pleasant little neighborhood. Except that no one responds to my cheery “hi!” or “good evening!” as I pass them on the trail. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com

item.title: Wednesday June 20, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: Last night was sushi. Surprisingly, I sort of liked some of it. Here’s a view of the ‘skyline’ of the exit we’re on off of Canadian Highway 1. Tonight we had Chinese. Delicious. Here’s a view of Mount Baker in Washington taken from CA Hwy 1 on the way back from dinner. We’re doing a lot of work (and it’s going pretty well), but we have had some time to make it fun. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com

item.title: Monday June 18, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: It’s been a crazy-busy-fun weekend. And I head up to Vancouver, BC tomorrow for just over a week of work. Yes, I’m going on an international business trip: go me. I’ve never been to Canada before. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com
